it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.server.match

Interface ServerViewInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerView

    public interface ServerViewInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Interface to manage correctly a RMI connection in a ServerView Class
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectToServerView(ClientInterface client, java.lang.String playerID)
      Method used to add to a ServerView the specify Client
      void disconnectClient(java.lang.String playerID)
      Method used to disconnect the specify ID from the ServerView
      void sendMessage(Message message)
      Method used to send a Message to the ServerView

    • Method Detail

      • connectToServerView

        void connectToServerView(ClientInterface client,
                         java.lang.String playerID)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to add to a ServerView the specify Client
        Parameters:
        client - The ClientInterface to add to the ServerView
        playerID - The chosen player's ID
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if there is a network error

      • disconnectClient

        void disconnectClient(java.lang.String playerID)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to disconnect the specify ID from the ServerView
        Parameters:
        playerID - The player's ID to disconnect from the ServerView
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if there is a network error

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(Message message)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used to send a Message to the ServerView
        Parameters:
        message - The message to send to the ServerView
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if there is a network error
